seo.title: Services | Digital Consulting & Web Development for SMEs | Metis Web Agency
seo.description: Digital strategy, conversion-focused websites & landing pages, SEO, Google/Meta Ads, brand identity, e-commerce, GA4/GTM tracking and ongoing growth support for small businesses.

content.title:
We don’t do “random tasks”.
We build a system that brings visibility and leads.
content.subtitle: Strategy, website, content and campaigns must work together.
content.body:
When every piece is disconnected, the outcome is predictable: you’re online, but nothing happens.

Here are the services we use to turn digital into a working tool: solid foundations, a clear message, clean tracking, and measurable growth.

content.title:
First we decide what to say and who we say it to.
Then we build. Then we drive traffic.
content.subtitle: The point isn’t “being online”. The point is getting found — and converting.

columns.title: If you start from the website, you may be skipping the most important step.
columns.description: Without positioning, message and priorities, a website becomes a collection of nice pages that don’t generate enquiries.

columns.title: If you start with Ads without foundations, you’re paying to send traffic into the void.
columns.description: Conversion-first and clean tracking, then visibility. That’s how every euro has a reason — and a measurable outcome.

header.title: Services (designed as a system)
header.subtitle: You can start from one need — but the goal stays the same: results.
header.body: We select only what you actually need based on your goal (leads, sales, positioning, growth).

items.title: Conversion-focused websites
items.description: Fast, clear websites built to generate enquiries: structure, copy, technical SEO and GA4/GTM tracking.

items.title: Landing pages & lead generation
items.description: Pages designed to convert: message, proof, offer, form and tracking. Perfect for Ads or a focused service offer.

items.title: SEO, copy & content
items.description: Words that sell and pages that rank: on-page SEO, persuasive copy, service pages and content that answers the right queries.

items.title: Ads management & conversion tracking
items.description: Google/Meta Ads + GA4/GTM key events. We track what matters and optimize based on real conversion data.

items.title: Ongoing growth support (monthly)
items.description: Continuous optimization across SEO, content and campaigns with reporting and iteration—so results compound over time.

items.title: Digital strategy
items.description: We define goals, audience and value proposition. We clarify priorities so execution stays focused and measurable.

content.title: What we never treat as an “extra”
content.subtitle: The foundations that prevent waste and enable growth.
content.body:
Performance & clarity (fast, readable pages)
Technical SEO basics (metadata, structure, indexability)
Clean tracking (GA4/GTM: useful events, not noise)
CTA & conversion (clear actions, simple paths)
Measurability (reports and data-driven decisions)

secondaryCta.label: Help me choose the right starting point

content.title: If you don’t know which service to pick — don’t start from the services.
content.subtitle: Start from the problem. We translate it into a plan with priorities and steps.

columns.title: Case 1 — I have a website but it doesn’t generate leads
columns.description: Quick audit, message/CTA rewrite, improve key pages, GA4/GTM tracking, then activate visibility (SEO/Ads) with reporting.

columns.title: Case 2 — I need a new website
columns.description: Strategy and structure before design: positioning, page map, copy, then development and technical SEO. So the website is born to “work”.

columns.title: Case 3 — I want Ads without wasting money
columns.description: Landing page + conversion-first, then campaigns. Budget and creatives improve when the page is ready and tracking is clean.

content.title: Message us on WhatsApp
content.subtitle: We’ll tell you if it makes sense, timing, and next steps.
content.description:
For a fast reply, send 3 things

01 — industry
02 — goal (leads / sales / visibility)
03 — website link (if any).

form.title: Tell us about your project
form.description: We’ll get back with a clear proposal — no unnecessary back and forth.
